sourcesContent:
import {
  Box,
  Flex,
  Link,
  List,
  ListItem,
  Text,
  VStack,
  Icon,
  Image,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { FaTwitter, FaGithub } from "react-icons/fa";

const Footer = () => {
  return (
    <Box as="footer" py={12} bg="gray.50" color="gray.600" fontSize="sm">
      <Flex
        direction={{ base: "column", md: "row" }}
        justify="space-between"
        align="center"
        maxW="1200px"
        mx="auto"
        px={4}
      >
        <VStack align="flex-start" spacing={4}>
          <Image src="/logo.png" alt="My Graphics" w={40} h={40} />
          <Text>© 2023 My Graphics. All rights reserved.</Text>
          <List spacing={2}>
            <ListItem>
              <Link href="https://twitter.com/mygraphics" isExternal>
                <Icon as={FaTwitter} mr={2} color="#1DA1F2" /> Twitter
              </Link>
            </ListItem>
            <ListItem>
              <Link href="https://github.com/mygraphics" isExternal>
                <Icon as={FaGithub} mr={2} color="#333" /> GitHub
              </Link>
            </ListItem>
            <ListItem>
              <Link href="/about">About</Link>
            </ListItem>
            <ListItem>
              <Link href="/contact">Contact</Link>
            </ListItem>
          </List>
        </VStack>
        <VStack align="flex-start" spacing={4}>
          <Text>Stay connected with me:</Text>
          <Flex align="center">
            <Link href="https://twitter.com/mygraphics" isExternal>
              <Icon as={FaTwitter} boxSize={6} mr={4} color="#1DA1F2" />
            </Link>
            <Link href="https://github.com/mygraphics" isExternal>
              <Icon as={FaGithub} boxSize={6} mr={4} color="#333" />
            </Link>
          </Flex>
        </VStack>
      </Flex>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Footer;
